title: Is it safe to eat uncooked toast?
description: You know that thing, inside, that stops you from saying or typing something that you just absolutely know you shouldn't? Yeah. I don't have that. This is a collection of blogs, tweets and forum posts that I have exposed to an unsuspecting world over the years. Hopefully it will make you laugh. WARNING: Some juvenile humour, one or two adult themes and a lot of swearing. Do not read this if you are of a sensitive disposition. Or eating.
author: E.Z. Bloke
